thought: To craft an acacia trapdoor, I first need to craft 2 acacia planks. To craft an acacia plank, I need to place an acacia log in the crafting grid. The acacia log is located at slot 40, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
